preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This book would likee to make live easyer for OTRS administrators and OTRS newbies. The installation, configuration and administration of the ticket system will be described in the following chapters and sections, so this book might be not that interesting for agents or customer users.

Although many hours of work, some liters of coffee and several pizzas were invested into the following sections, it is for sure not complete. There will be errors, not good explained parts or still missing chapters about important things. For sure some chapters will be reworked or new chapters and sections will be added.

Because the book tryes to supply the needs of OTRS admins or OTRS newbies and the quality should be as good as possible, we need your feedback. Please let us know, if you miss something in this book, if things are explained not good enough or even if you see spelling mistakes, gramatical errors or typos. Any kind of feedback is highly appreciated and should be made via our bug tracking system on
http://bugs.otrs.org
. We want to thank you for all kind of feedback!
